snippet.title: Poly Bridge Trailer
snippet.description:
Poly Bridge is a physics-based bridge creation game, with a social twist. Players can test their ingenuity against more than 60 carefully constructed puzzles, or, they can create their very own and share them with the online community. Building bridges is hard work and requires trial and error, and thanks to an easy-to-use gif upload system, sharing those errors has never been easier, or more hilarious.

Hitting Steam and Humble Store on June 30th.

Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/367450

More at http://polybridge.drycactus.com/
